channel.title: How do you use hamachi?
channel.description: ok i have no idea how to work the hamachi but i know how to fix it..can someone explain how to USE it? Please dont say "download it here www.hamachi.cc" because i have already done that.I need help on how to use it on servers... Help is appreciated :)

item.title: How do you use hamachi?
item.dc:creator: @e0n e0n™
item.description:
@e0n wrote:

F0rum Mvp:

could say ( user: Server 1-10 Pass: 123).

you mean should? lol

Read full topic

item.title: How do you use hamachi?
item.dc:creator: @F0rum_Mvp F0rum Mvp
item.description:
@F0rum_Mvp wrote:

ok, if you look on server advertisement, some servers will need you to have hamachi for you to join the server. look on that thread at the hamachi username (e.g Server 1-10). Now look in the bottom right corner of your hamachi box and look for a triangle with 3 dots symbol, not the the circle one. Click on join existing network and type in the server username and pass. On a thread it could say ( user: Server 1-10 Pass: 123). Make sure you use capital letters and spaces as it is shown. Now look for the owner of the server’s ip and check if the server is online. check you have the right port and you should be able to log on a ham server.

Sorry if this is a bit long and confusing.

Read full topic
